TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Zayazayan, title = Zayazayan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zayazayan} }

S.FORM: alang Zayazayan ga niya mki sku Heto Keng atu Maka go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 233 buwan, 793 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 97% kyan ku 768 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 3% kyan ku 25 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Paywan 89%, Rukay 3%, Tayan 1%, Amis 1%, Bunun 1%, binah lihuyan s'uli 2%. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Zayazayan hya' ga Masilid. tay 'zil na Zayazayan hya' ga Vecekadan. rekisi kayal kyokay ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Zayazayan ga niya mki sko Heto Keng ato Maka go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 233 bowan, 793 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 97% kyan ko 768 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 3% kyan ko 25 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Paywan 89%, Rokay 3%, Tayan 1%, Amis 1%, Bonon 1%, binah lihoyan s'oli 2%. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Zayazayan hya' ga Masilid. tay 'zil na Zayazayan hya' ga Vecekadan. rekisi kayal kyokay ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
